author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: China lifts restrictions in Hubei but infections rise elsewhere
description: IMF expects G20 leader action plan will trigger global recession
content:
China will lift restrictions on movement in most areas of Hubei province on Wednesday, ending a lockdown of the area brought on by the coronavirus outbreak.
People who are cleared will be able to leave the province after midnight on Tuesday.
